    Description

    Accordion module for collapsible content sections.

    Module for displaying data in tables.

    Dynamic card module that can be rendered with specific content.

    Wrapper that adds edit/delete buttons to any module.

    Module for creating forms.

    Module for displaying forum posts.

    Module for displaying image galleries.
    HeroModule
    Hero module for creating prominent banner/header sections.
    QuoteModule
    Quote module for displaying testimonials, quotes, or highlighted text.
    RichContentModule
    Rich content module that can contain paragraphs, images, and links.
    SimpleListModule
    Simple list module demonstrating container pattern with list items.
